entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then rain. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
